word: Jesus is a pattern for humanity, complete, perfect. He proposes to make us like Himself\97true in every purpose, feeling, and thought\97true in heart, soul, and life. The man or woman who cherishes the most of the love of Christ in the soul, who reflects the image of Christ most perfectly, is, in the sight of God, the truest, most noble, and most honorable person. But those who have not the Spirit of Christ are \93none of his.\94\97Signs of the Times, July 14, 1887.
